bower-amcharts

This repo is for distribution on bower. The source for this module is in the AmCharts. Please file issues and pull requests against that project.

Install

Install with bower:

bower install amcharts

Add a <script> to your index.html:

<script src="/bower_components/amcharts/dist/amcharts/amcharts.js"></script>

Documentation and Demos

Documentation is available on the AmCharts docs site. AmCharts demo site.

License

This AmCharts software is free under a linkware license.

This means you may not remove or hide in any other way link to amcharts web site - www.amcharts.com.

If you wish to remove the link, you should purchase commercial license.

You may not redistribute, sublicense or sell this program without written permission of Antanas Marcelionis, the author of amcharts software.

This software is provided without warranty.

A commercial version (without link) is available at amCharts's website: http://shop.amcharts.com/
